entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider mapping (and querying) of geometry collections #30630
  • NullReferenceException when a hierarchy has OwnedEntity #30629
  • Set different configuration in IEntityTypeConfiguration based on provider #30624
  • The value of '<key>' is unknown - property is part of a foreign key for which the principal entity in the relationship is not known #30623
  • NullRef scaffolding Postgres DB #30621
  • Entity Framework SQLite Treats 0 As NULL For Non-Nullable fields #30620
  • EFCore6.x 用代码实现自动迁移 #30619
  • ObjectContext.GetObjectType not available in EF core #30618

Closed

  • No noticeable benefit to Sqlite Pooled connections when using an encrypted database #27148
  • Mapping entity and derived entity to separate tables using TPC #30607

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix to #30326 - Query: converter from bool used in predicate without comparison fails on sqlite (and other non-sql server backends?) #30633
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Handle quotes in table name in GetSchemaTable #30632
  • Scaffolding: Fix handling of ConnectionString annotation #30631
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #30628
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Fix to #29638 - GroupBy generates invalid SQL when using custom database function #30617

Merged

  • [SMALL/TEST ONLY] Small fix to JSON update tests #30616
    auto-merge
  • [release/7.0] Fix to #30358 - Duplicate table alias in generated select query (An item with the same key has already been added) #30486
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.x] Fixes around IncludeExpression for ExecuteUpdate/Delete (#30571) #30579
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0] Fix to #30115 - IndexOutOfRangeException in CreateNavigationExpansionExpression #30591
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.6
  • Update branding to 7.0.6 #30627
  • Update branding to 6.0.17 #30626
  • Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient from 5.1.0 to 5.1.1 #30612
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.32.2 to 3.32.3 #30613
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Fix for #30266 and #30565 - projecting json entity/reference as well as regular entity collection #30600
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0] Fix to #30330 - Json: updating property with conversion from string to other type fails on sql server #30615
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.6
  • Update SDK #30608
  • Translate non-aggregate string.Join to CONCAT_WS on SQL Server #28900
